function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Promotion of open science without concrete efforts to improve research quality","Impact":"Spread of inaccurate or dangerous ideas, slow self-correction of scientific errors, potential patient harm","Mitigation":"Implement full data sharing, publish registered reports of study protocols, make modeling used in policy decisions public","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Researchers, clinicians, public","Owner":"Researchers, scientific community"},{"Description":"Reliance on preprints for public-health decisions without robust filtering","Impact":"Transmission of inaccurate data, illegitimate results being translated into clinical practice","Mitigation":"Implement living systematic reviews to synthesize emerging evidence, scrutinize data and use proven therapies","Technologies":"Living systematic reviews","People":"Clinicians, public","Owner":"Clinicians, researchers, scientific community"}]}
